message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will bring significant value to your business. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1400000. Is this something you'd like to consider?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're looking to get a good deal, but I have to consider my own needs as well. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my target price. I'm now offering the product to you for $1350000. This is a fair compromise, considering the value I'm bringing to the table.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $1200000. I'm willing to compromise and offer $1250000. This is the highest I'm willing to go, considering the market value of the product.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob, but I'm not quite ready to accept $1250000. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to get closer to my target price. I'm now offering the product to you for $1300000. This is a fair price, considering the value I'm bringing to the table, and I believe it's a reasonable compromise.

I understand your concerns, Alice, and I appreciate your willingness to make concessions. However, I'm still not comfortable going above $1250000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $1290000. This is the highest I'm willing to go, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, and I'm glad we're getting closer to a deal. However, I still need to get closer to my target price. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get at least $1320000. I'm now offering the product to you for $1320000. This is my final concession, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

I understand that you're making one last concession, Alice, and I appreciate your willingness to work with me. However, I'm still not comfortable going above $1250000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $1310000. This is the highest I'm willing to go, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

I'm starting to get concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle, Bob. I've made significant concessions, and I'm not willing to go any lower than $1320000. I'm willing to give you one more chance to meet me at this price. If not, I'll have to consider other options. I'm now offering the product to you for $1320000. This is my final offer, and I hope you'll take it.

I understand that you're making one final offer, Alice, and I appreciate your willingness to work with me. However, I've already gone as high as I'm willing to go, and I'm still not comfortable paying $1320000. I'm going to have to pass on this deal and explore other options. I'm willing to walk away from this deal and buy the product from John for $1200000.
